reviews.review: This is a really nice game to play with friends on. Its pretty easy to run even if you have a mac. :D

The gameplay is really fun , the guns are a different story everytime! I do recommend this game if you do like shoot-em-up games and lots of awesome fun!

Really fun game. It may look like a basic ''horde'' type of game but has little things that keep you playing.

This game is a masterpiece. If you're looking for a cooperative title to play with your buds, THIS IS THE SHIT. No really. This game is 7 years old. SEVEN YEARS OLD. And the developers are still releasing free updates for the game on a regular basis. The boys at Tripwire are fantastic developers and this needs a sequel on the new Unreal engine <3
Good way to take out aggression..and fulfil your community badge. :)
If this game was a pancake it would be one of those pancakes drenched in syrup that when you eat it has a weird consistancy but it still tastes good anyway
A vivid experience. Viewing the social impact of death closing in should be compulsory for all learned people. This is a viewport into human ingenuity in the wake of lethal danger.
This game is great, and I'd totally pick it up if you don't already have it.

Killing Floor is by far one of the best games I have ever played. The combat feels awesome and when you get a headshot and then follow those shots with more, it feels amazing. The game is difficult and relies heavily on teamwork. If you lonewolf, you're screwed because enemies deal alot of damage. I also like the way there is a money system and how you can give or trade money and weapons in any given moment. The game is constantly being updated and new content is uploaded frequently. My only gripe with the game is the server list interface, because the text is small. That's it. BUY THIS GAME NOW YOU WILL GET ADDICTED.
i want play killing floor add me please

I very fun game, enjoyable and alot of fun with friends. Leveling up is rewarding. During Holloween, Christmas, and the summer have event's where you can get new acheivements and new characters in game. Good weapons. Good maps, and of course custom maps from the workshop.
This game is really good to you if you like zombie and survivor games.
I ve played since 2009 and I m still enjoy with this game.

View it as a cheap British alternative to Value's Left 4 Dead, but with no main plot-line, story, and solid charactor foundation, but There are staggering zombies, crawling beasts, naked invisible wench ladies, huddled witch-types with screams that blast ear-drums and turn the air bright red, and a chap with a giant LED stuck in his chest who you won't like very much when he gets angry. It's a limited yet balanced menagerie, and one that looks great when limbs start getting detached. Granted, it's replay value can get dull after awhile, but get 5 of your friends and enjoy a bloody, clever, boisterous, faintly silly and relatively cheap game.
If you like COD zombie mode or Left For Dead, you will LOVE this game!
игра скучная,совершенно не интресно играть в нее.епт

Compared to L4D, this game is paced MUCH slower. However, it features probably the best gun mechanics and bullet physics I have ever experienced in a first-person shooter. I very much prefer this game over any other in its genre. 

This game is made by a company who is providing free content for their game in 2014 and it was released in 2009. Just... wow. Talk about dedicated, fair and honest developers (and publishers!)

great game, most fun with friends though.

beware german buyers: Try a not-german-friend to gift it to you or something since the annoying german censorship takes a huge hit at the atmosphere imho

Я скучаю по тем временам, когда я вовсе не умел играть в КФ, когда в игре не было даже клейморов и намёков на стимпанк, ибо ныне эта игра мертва. Просто в один момент мой любимый шутер заболел ужасной болезнью, которую называют DLC, и эта болезнь лишила игру всей атмосферы, которая была на высоте, после чего ещё и разработчики добавили свои штрихи казуальности, чутка изменив некоторые тонкости геймплея.
В результате у нас есть шутер с адом и плазменными пушками (Но не Дум), петухами и деревенскими роцкерами (Хотя разницы толком нет) да стимпанком и роботами (Хотя стимпанк вполне терпим).
Всем бетку КФ или версии 2010-го года.
Kill zombies, lots of mods, superhappyfuntime.
Great game many different ways to edit the game mode

This is a very fun FPS horror survival, its great to play with friends and difficulties ramp up very fast if you change them. the game has limited weapon selection but they keep updating it and bringin in more so its to bad, but the best part is that i dont think ppl mention is the classes that are selectable in game! i think its very creative and adds a extra twist to the game. If you have time and few bucks to spare, get this game its great !

Hands down one of my favorite games. There is always new content being added to the game, of DLC that can be purchased, always for a low price and free content as well. The servers are well maintained and most importantly this game is fun. I have had this game for close to two years now and it is still my first choice when a friend asks which game to play together online.
The Z.E.D time is the best in this game. Great game to play with friends.

I got this game during the Halloween Sale after being interesting in it after watching Roosterteeth do a 'Lets Play' of it, and I must say that is a very fun game to play either by yourself or with friends as a team.

This is a wave based game pitting you and/or a team against 10 waves of ever increasingly diffcult monsters, each with thier own unique way of making surviving difficult for you. After beating the 10th wave you and your team are pitted against the 'Patriarch' who will test you and your teams skill and ability to work together to the max.

+ Fun and simply gameplay to learn.
+ Huge arsenal of weapons to destroy your enemies.
+ Very creative set of maps with the game constantly including new maps created and recommended by the community.
+ Funnest game to play with your friends.

- Can be cruel if you die during a wave as you lose your weapon and some ingame money.
- Whole team dying except one on wave 10 can make respawning and then fighting wave 11 almost impossible.

Overall this is very fun game to play, with developers who respect the community by importing custom made maps in, and also custom made weapons offcially imported, also more awaits in the Steam Workshop.

Overall Score: 7/10
